General.Name: CarrefourSA Carrefour Sabanci Ticaret Merkezi AS
General.Description: CarrefourSA Carrefour Sabanci Ticaret Merkezi A.S. engages in the retail business in Turkey. It also engages in the construction of non-residential buildings. The company was incorporated in 1991 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey. CarrefourSA Carrefour Sabanci Ticaret Merkezi A.S. is a subsidiary of Haci Ömer Sabanci Holding A.S.
General.Address: CarrefourSA Plaza, Block B, Istanbul, Turkey, 34846
